title: Blue Mountain Bistro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is primarily meat but does include a vegetarian special of the day - please call ahead to confirm. Uses fresh tomatoes and cucumbers from local greenhouse. November 2012 report: former vegan trained chef left her position and new chef is not aware of veg diets. Please confirm if the vegan options are good enough to keep this listing on HappyCow.
